betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oYou may wantto bring good gear...

§fWhile the Shyre Empire seems to hold no qualms about using many of its own fighters as cannon (well, recursion) fodder, those that are powerful and cruel enough are indeed held to a higher status.
Powerful and cruel. Those words, to be fair, fail to fully encompass the nature of Iromine, the warrior world of metal. 
If the warriors of Barathos are akin to the Roman Empire, a proud nation with a strong foundation in personal power and battle prowess, Iromine's forces are the Huns, a horde of violent war criminals.
I suspect religion plays very little role at holding this place under the Empire. The call for violence appears to be more than enough.
